type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Knight Noble
rules_text:
Vigilance, reach
[i]Paragon[/i] – If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on a permanent you control, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put onto that permanent instead.
[i]Bow Paladin[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, support X, where X is the number of Archers you control. [i](To support X, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X other target creatures.)[/i]
